comparison.expectedPerformance: Should be 3-4x faster than 16-core home computer

bottlenecks: Disk performance degrades significantly with large files

recommendations.solution: Install VIPS binary with OpenMP for better multi-threading

recommendations.issue: Disk performance degrades with large files
recommendations.solution: Use NVMe SSD or check disk health
